scripts.dev: eleventy --serve & npx tailwindcss -i styles/tailwind.css -o _site/styles/index.css --watch & stork build --input _site/stork-posts.toml --output _site/index.st
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true npx @11ty/eleventy && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i styles/tailwind.css -o _site/styles/index.css --minify
